lines.gurmukhi: pMc qq myl ipMf lok byd khYN pwNco; qq kho kwhy BwNiq rcq By Awid hI [

Unknown.translation: Common knowledge, Vedas and other religious scriptures say that body is made of five elements. But tell me, how have these five elements come into existence?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ilKy hoey vyd SwsqR Awid kihMdy hn qy zbwnI vI isAwxy qy Awm lok kihMdy hn ik pMjwˆ q`qwˆ dy myl qoˆ srIr bxdw hY, pr d`so ik pMjy q`q Awid ivc iks qrHwˆ rcy gey hn?

lines.gurmukhi: kwhy sy Drn DwrI DIrj kYsy ibQwrI; kwhy sXo gVXo Akws TwFo ibn pwd hI [

Unknown.translation: How is Earth supported and how is patience spread in it? How is sky secured and how is it existing without any support?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iks nwl DrqI itkweI hoeI hY, qy aus ivc DIrjqw ikvyˆ iKlwrI hoeI hY, AkwS iks nwl gifAw hoieAw hY, jo ibnwˆ pYrwˆ dy KVw hY?

lines.gurmukhi: kwhy sON sll swjy sIql pvn bwjy; Agn qpq kwhy Aiq ibsmwd hI [

Unknown.translation: How is water made? How does breeze blow? How is fire hot? All this is very wondrous.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iks nwl pwxI bxwieAw qy TMFI pOx Avwz krdI hY? A`g ikauˆ qpqI hY? bVw hI Ascrj hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kwrn krn dyv AlK AByv nwQ; aun kI BI EhI jwnY, bkno hY bwd jI [624[

Unknown.translation: The effulgent Lord is beyond comprehension. No one can know His secret. He is the cause of all happenings. He alone knows the secret of all these things. So it is futile for us to make any statement in connection with creation of Universe.  (624)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ienHwˆ sBnwˆ dy kwrnwˆ dy krn vwlw mUl kwrx AlK nwQ Awp hY,aus dw Byd BI nhIˆ pqw l`gdw, aus dI BI auh Awp hI jwxdw hY swfw ieh kihxw iblkul ivArQ hY ]624]
